name: interlacustrine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in or relating to an area between lakes, especially an area of eastern central Africa that is between Lakes Victoria, Kyoga, Albert, Edward, and Tanganyika: The train climbed onto the low interlacustrine ridge. the interlacustrine highlands of Burundi, Rwanda, and western Uganda
More examplesFewer examplesthe noble kingships of the inter-lacustrine zonea case study of Late Stone Age and Early Iron Age settlement in the interlacustrine regiona study of migration and drought in Interlacustrine Africa There are suggestions of technical variability in the interlacustrine region in both late and early Iron Age times.
